text: @devs working on the boilerplate: Are there any roadmap for providing us more control over loaded header and footer include scripts. For instance avoiding banner.js from loading when HS Banner is disabled in Settings - or being able to timeout the v2 forms JS file for x hundred milliseconds etc?
Since this is somewhat related, i am posting this again :slightly_smiling_face:....  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Disable-scripts-that-are-not-needed/idi-p/599178>
